text: Fairwarp is a small village within the civil parish of Maresfield in the Wealden district of East Sussex, England. Its nearest town is Uckfield, which lies approximately south from the village, just off the B2026 road. Reginald John Campbell, British Congregationalist and Anglican divine, died at his home in the village in 1956."Death of Dr Reginald J. Campbell" – The Glasgow Herald, March 2, 1956. The actors Joan Tetzel and Oscar Homolka are buried together at Christ Church.Resting Places ==References== ==External links== * History – Fairwarp Community Society Category:Villages in East Sussex Category:Wealden
title: Fairwarp
